nodes.text: The 100 Greatest Things About Star Wars... Ever!

"The 100 Greatest Things About Star Wars... Ever!" is an article published in Star Wars Insider 100 (and in issue #76 in the UK version of the magazine), which lists the 100 most popular entries in the StarWars.com databank. Each item on the list is accompanied by excerpts from the databank, condensed by Paul Simpson, and comments by Pablo Hidalgo.
The article is based on the number of views of the entries in the databank and serves to celebrate the 100th issue of the American version of the Star Wars Insider magazine.
